title: 2020 Annual Report
body: HelioGen Solar Systems reached revenue of $74M with heliostat prototype demonstrations. Technology validation strengthened partnerships. Risks noted: water intensity of CSP, tariff exposure.

title: 2021 Annual Report
body: Revenue grew to $96M on first European CSP pilot. Strong R&D and hiring sustained. ESG commitments emphasize water neutrality.

title: 2022 Annual Report
body: HelioStore battery launched. Revenue $134M; product diversification reduced intermittency risks. Partnerships expanded.

title: 2023 Annual Report
body: Revenue $174M; ACWA partnership announced. Geographic expansion seen as key driver. Risks: water scarcity, supply chain volatility.

title: 2024 Annual Report
body: Revenue $226M despite water scarcity challenge. Dry cooling redesign improved ESG profile. Contract book at record high.

title: Heliostat Array Demo
body: Demonstrated field of highâ€‘reflectivity heliostats leading to early traction with utilities.

title: Spain CSP Pilot
body: Secured $15M pilot with Spanish utility for CSP integration into national grid.

title: HelioStore Launch
body: Thermal battery platform announced for utility deployments enabling night-time power.

title: ACWA Power Partnership
body: JV announced with Saudi ACWA Power for MENA CSP plants.

title: Water Scarcity Challenges
body: Arid region site had cooling delays. Mitigation with new dry cooling concept planned.

title: Dry Cooling Design Implemented
body: Introduced redesigned cooling solution to ensure water neutral operations.

title: JV with ACWA & EDF
body: Strategic JV to deliver large CSP projects combining expertise and capital.

title: Q2 2025 Earnings
body: Record EPC bookings, revenue $41M in Q2, growth momentum continues. Guidance revised upward.
